name: Meteo: Facade
description:
Meteo: Facade is a first person point and click adventure game. You are trapped with a mysterious girl in a labyrinth-like location full of rooms blocked by obstacles, challenges and puzzles that bar your escape.

Devblog: http://facadegame.tumblr.com/

Alpha 0.0.3/Demo Day 2 - 8.05.2015

Just in time for demo day!

If you want to play the previous demo which has the first two levels in their early build stages, you can get it here: http://facadegame.tumblr.com/post/99697534766/

This demo will only feature the third room of the game. Another key feature in this build is the abilty to swap Sunnie's costume (Press space). Now that this feature is in I can create a whole lot of costumes that can be unlocked.

Over the past 6 months I have been picking up various jobs and projects so progress on this room has been a bit slow. At the moment it is a bit barebone but is fully playable to the end.

As always, this is an ALPHA, there is placeholder & missing sounds, music and animations. I don't really need to be told about these things as I'm aware and still working on it, but I would like to know of weird bugs that you happen to come across. I look forward to everyone's feedback and impressions!

I'm also looking for a composer/music guy who would like to contribute to the game. Also a voice actor for Sunnie, I wouldn't need any voice actor work until I'm almost done with the game, but I think it is a good idea to start thinking about it now.

If you want to contact me about anything, hit me up on Twitter, Deviantart or my e-mail.

Twitter: http://twitter.com/Poribo/
DA: http://poribo.deviantart.com
e-mail: paul.mahoney@poribo.com

Controls
'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' - Move/Walk
Left Click - Interact/Advance
Right Click - Toggle Cursor Mode
SPACE - Change to alternate costume
Escape - Menu
